metadata.name: No 745
metadata.description:
Allow me to introduce you to the ***.cmposer/CNDUCTR** device

CNDUCTR units has allow you, the listener, to have full control over a piece of music loaded within. This unit contains **Working No 745**, a melody. This unit also grants **CC-BY** license to the melody and any variation you create with it  

'**CNDUCTR**' Flips the unit over  
'**PLAY**' starts the current melody  
'**STOP**' to stop the current melody  
'**RECORD**' to record your performance*  
'**LEFT / RIGHT** arrow' selection of the melody presets  
'**DOWNLOAD**' to download your recording to your device  
'**LEFT / RIGHT** slider' to adjust **PITCH** and **TEMPO**  
'**UP / DOWN** sliders' to control **VOLUME** of each channel  
'**LABELED BUTTONS**' mute / unmute the labeled sound element

Toggles 'FX1 / FX2 / FX3'  
**FX1** - Reverb  
**FX2** - BitCrusher  
**FX3** - Low-pass filter

Keyboard controls  
Windows  
**Numberpad** '/ * -' toggles FX buttons  
**Numberpad** '0' PLAY  
**Numberpad** '+' RECORD

Windows & MacOS  
**Keyboard** 'q,w,e,r' toggles labeled buttons  
**Keyboard** 'a,s,d' Preset selection  
**Keyboard** '1,2,3' toggles FX buttons  
**Keyboard** 'spacebar' PLAY  

*Additional information  
-Links and recording capability may be disabled by a marketplace  
-NFT can be accessed directly via any IPFS gateway for full features  
-NFT can be added to mobile device from IPFS as a mobile app by using "add to home" feature. This will enable fullscreen and local playback  
-Recording turns on a metronome, metronome sound is not recorded in the file  
-DOWNLOAD button is only enabled after recording has stopped  
-Low-pass filter applies effect only to the melody

A detailed copy available at  
https://iamMozart.com/
